Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['Make a cup of coffee using the coffee maker.']

behavior plug_in_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        plugin(coffee_maker)

behavior switch_on_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        switch_on(coffee_maker)

behavior prepare_coffee(cup:item, coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        get_water(coffee_maker) # Fill the coffee maker with water
        switch_on_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker) and has_plug(coffee_maker)
        # Select a coffee maker with a plug
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup) and recipient(cup) 
        # Select a cup
        plug_in_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Plug in the coffee maker
        prepare_coffee(cup, coffee_maker)
        # Prepare coffee using the coffee maker

Goal Representation:
behavior observe_coffee_maker(coffe_maker:item):
    body:
        observe(coffe_maker, "Check if the coffee maker is plugged in and has water")

behavior plug_in_coffee_maker(coffe_maker:item):
    body:
        plugin(coffe_maker)

behavior fill_water(coffe_maker:item):
    body:
        get_water(coffe_maker)

behavior make_coffee(coffe_maker:item):
    body:
        switch_on(coffe_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffe_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffe_maker) and close_char(char, coffe_maker)
                
        observe_coffee_maker(coffe_maker)
        
        if unplugged(coffe_maker):
            plug_in_coffee_maker(coffe_maker)
        
        if not has_water(coffe_maker):
            fill_water(coffe_maker)

        make_coffee(coffe_maker)
